name: CloudFrontForwardedValues
description: ForwardedValues is a property of the DefaultCacheBehavior and CacheBehavior properties that indicates whether Amazon CloudFront forwards query strings or cookies.

properties.name: Cookies
properties.desc: Forwards specified cookies to the origin of the cache behavior.

properties.name: Headers
properties.desc: Specifies the headers that you want Amazon CloudFront to forward to the origin for this cache behavior (whitelisted headers). For the headers that you specify, Amazon CloudFront also caches separate versions of a specified object that is based on the header values in viewer requests.

properties.name: QueryString
properties.desc: Indicates whether you want CloudFront to forward query strings to the origin that is associated with this cache behavior. If so, specify true; if not, specify false.
